MatchCfg:
<@TABLEAU>
<MatchMode MissionType="map<enum<.MissionType>,MatchMode>" desc="string" >
<Camp CampID="[Camp]" PlayerNum="int32" desc="string" /> <Strategy StrategyID="enum<.ENMMatchStrategy>" desc="string" />
<Scope ScopeID="enum<.ENMMatchScope>" desc="string" /> <Filter FilterID="[Filter]<enum<.ENMMatchFilter>>" Open="bool" Value="int32" UpdInterval="duration" desc="string"> <Power HornorPower="[Power]"> <Param Value="[Param]"/>
<AI Type="[AI]<enum<.ENMAIWarmType>>" IsOpen="bool" MinTime="duration" MaxTime="duration" desc="string" />
<Random MissionType="[Random]<enum<.MissionType>>" Priority="int32" />
</@TABLEAU>
